twisters.text: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers. A peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked. If Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers,Where’s the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked ?
She sells sea shells by the sea shore. The shells she sells are surely sea shells. So if she sells shells on the seashore, I’m sure she sells seashore shells.
How can a clam cram in a clean cream can?
I saw Susie sitting in a shoeshine shop. Where she shines she sits, and where she sits she shines.

Betty Botter bought some butter, but she said the butter’s bitter. If I put it in my batter, it will make my batter bitter. But a bit of better butter will make my batter better. So, ’twas better Betty Botter bought a bit of better butter.
